name: Blackout (itch) (fermeaux)
description:
This is a game about a man who drank so much that he maid a blackout. When he woke up a red cell and a baby nerve in his brain work to fill the memory hole.

The red cell can move objects and place connector. Care ! He is vulnerable.

To help the cell, the second player play a baby nerve who can't hold object but he can release electric shock. This is usefull to activate some area of the brain.

Disclaimer : We are sorry to say that isn't a finished project. We finally don't have enough time cause of the work and life event. Thank you for your understanding.

HOW TO PLAY : azerty keyboard

Red cell : [move] zqsd / [dash] space/ [ability(grab obj)] a  

Baby nerve : [move] arrows/ [dash] numpad0 / [ability(release electric shock)]  numpad1
